description: Meet your new favorite running companion, their PhD® Run Ultra Light Pattern Crew socks. Simple in look, but not in design, these technical running socks are built with their Indestructawool™ technology for enhanced durability, their 4 Degree™ elite fit system for a performance-oriented fit, and their Shred Shield™ technology to ensure your toenails don't tear up such a great sock. Don't leave home without 'em.
name: Smartwool PhD Run Zero Cushion Pattern Crew Socks - Mens
